div.span: Due to the mandate from Ohio Governor, Mike DeWine regarding the Coronavirus Disease, Buckeye schools are currently closed. All instruction will be online for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. Refer to your Google Classrooms for additional information. Please stay tuned for ongoing updates.

ul.li: Coronavirus Disease Superintendent's Message - Updated: March 21, 2020

meta.name: viewport
meta.button: How do I connect my Chromebook to my home WiFi?

ol.li: Click the Wi-Fi icon in the bottom, right corner of your Chromebook screen.
Click the network icon near the top, left of the window.
Select your home WiFi network and type your home network password in.

br.button: My Internet is slow. What should I do?

ol.li: There are a variety of reasons why your Internet could be running slowly. However, sometimes a simple reboot of your modem/router can solve speed issues. Go to your modem and/or router and unplug both. Wait 60 seconds and plug back in. The modem and router will take several minutes to reboot. Wait approximately 5-10 minutes and try your Internet again.

br.button: My Chromebook will not turn on. What should I do?

ol.li: First, be sure your Chromebook has been charged.

If you are not sure, attach the power adapter to the Chromebook. Sometimes if a battery is completely depleted, it will not power on right away even with the adapter connected. Wait approximately 15 minutes to give the computer time to charge the battery. Try turning the Chromebook back on after this time.

br.button: The trackpad on my Chromebook isn't working. What should I do?

ol.li: Try attaching a corded or wireless mouse to the Chromebook.

br.button: There are keys on my keyboard that are not working. What should I do?

ol.li: Try attaching a corded or wireless keyboard to the Chromebook.

div.div: Click the button below for more information on the Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).

br.div: Amidst a difficult and unfortunate end to the school year, I would like to highlight some positives for the Buckeye Local School District. The entire Buckeye Family including administrators, teachers, technology, food service, operations and support staff should be commended and congratulated for working diligently to provide our students with quality education and services that are clearly seen in our data. I would like to thank the entire Buckeye community for your ongoing support because together, we are making a solid difference for the future of our children and community.
Here are some of the results on our local report card. Go Warriors!
Superintendent of Buckeye Local School District
